content.rendered: Tingkatkan sistem keamanan bangunan dengan memasang Infinity NVR NV-3504-H1/4P. Kamera CCTV Infinity NVR NV-3504-H1/4P dapat membantu anda dalam menjaga aset di dalam bangunan ataupun luar bangunan. NVR Infinity NVR NV-3504-H1/4P adalah produkt terbaik karena sudah dibekaliEmbedded Plug & Play NVR Features • Up to 6 Megapixel Resolution Recording • 40 Mbps Incoming Bandwidth • Supports H.264+ and H.264 • Synchronous HDMI and VGA Output 1920 × 1080p Resolution • 4-ch Network Cameras Can Be Connected • 1 SATA Interface • Plug & Play w/Up to 4 Independent PoE Network Connections • Supports Network Detection, Including Network Delay, Packet Loss • Supports network detection, including network delay, packet loss, etc
